pages.title: Home
pages.seoDescription: Cafe Awake was started by Jon and Sara Hamiton, an American couple living in the beautiful remote Himalayan Foothills of southwest China.

sections.title: Endeavoring to Reach the Frontiers of the Coffee World
sections.text: We endeavor to travel mountain roads, make friends with incredible farmers, and bring back unique, specialty-grade coffee. When you purchase Awake coffee, you are getting a specialty cup of quality, fresh-roasted, frontier beans, but more importantly you are investing into the hearts and lives of precious people around the globe.

pages.title: About
pages.seoDescription: Endeavor With Us To Reach The Frontiers Of The Coffee World

sections.title: Endeavor With Us To Reach The Frontiers Of The Coffee World
sections.text: When you purchase Awake Coffee, you are getting a specialty cup of quality, fresh roasted frontier beans, but more importantly you are investing into the hearts and lives of precious people around the globe.

sections.title: About Our Coffee
sections.text:
We endeavor to travel winding mountain roads, make friends with incredible farmers, and bring back unique, specialty-grade coffee. Coffee is the world's second most traded commodity, and we believe it should be sourced with integrity, excellence, and transparency. Through direct sourcing our beans from these villages, we can ensure integrity and transparency from seed to cup. 

We will always prioritize the incredible renewable relationships this endeavor enables us to initiate. And while it's about more than coffee for us, we sincerely believe this will be the best cup of coffee you've ever had. Thank you for endeavoring with us to reach the frontier of the coffee world!

sections.title: Yunnan Coffee
sections.text:
The Yunnan coffee story originated in the late 19th century after French missionary Alfred Lietard brought plants with him. He originally did this as a desire for a personal cup for himself. He planted the first Arabica beans in the valleys and villages near the city of Binchuan, in Yunnan. Today, generations later, there are more than thirty varietals that continue to thrive that can be traced back to these early seeds that were planted by Lietard.

We have traveled the winding road to the original farm planted by Alfred Lietard. There are trees still growing that are over 100 years old. We have visited other farms in Yunnan and cupped these varietals, and we are thrilled to share with you this very special coffee that we discovered on our expeditions!

sections.title: Our Story
sections.text:
After four years of living an adventure in Asia and falling in love with its peoples and cultures, founders and coffee-lovers Jon and Sara Hamilton ventured into the world of business and launched Cafe Awake in 2015. Awake was birthed out of an entrepreneurial heart and a desire to bring specialty coffee to their local Himalayan Foothills community. The journey of making Cafe Awake a reality opened their eyes to the truly special nature of high-altitude-cultivated Yunnan coffee.

The Awake international team has grown, and we've worked side-by-side with connoisseurs from a dozen nationalities. The undertaking that began in the shadows of the Himalayas has truly become a global venture. With the expansion of each new Cafe Awake location, we strive to keep these renewable relationships at the core of what we do as a company.  

We source only single-origin, specialty-grade, and micro-lot coffee. And while it's about more than coffee for us, we sincerely believe this will be the best cup of coffee you've ever had.

article.title: If you are new to this Awake Endeavor

sections.text:
We’re so excited to bring you on the journey to discovering the uncut gem of Yunnan coffee. In addition to the Himalayan foothills varieties, our team has also hand-selected artisan beans from around the globe. With each new variety, your daily cup of coffee is investing into the hearts and lives of people around the globe.

The story is just beginning. Endeavor with us to reach the frontiers of the coffee world.

  • If you have trouble finding us just give us a call and we are happy to direct you!

pages.title: 关于
pages.seoDescription: 与我们一起努力到达咖啡世界的前沿

sections.title: 与我们一起努力到达咖啡世界的前沿
sections.subtitle: 故事才刚刚开始
sections.text: 当您购买 Awake Coffee 时，您将获得一杯优质的新鲜烘焙边境咖啡豆，但更重要的是，您正在投资于全球珍贵人们的心灵和生活。

sections.title: 关于我们的咖啡
sections.text:
我们努力在蜿蜒的山路上前行，与不可思议的咖农交朋友，并带回特级的咖啡。咖啡是世界上第二大贸易商品，我们相信它应该以诚信、卓越和透明的方式采购。通过直接从这些村庄采购咖啡豆，我们可以确保从种子到杯子的完整性和透明度。

我们将始终优先考虑这一努力使我们能够发展一种前所未有的可再生关系。对我们来说，这不仅仅是普通咖啡，而将是你喝过的最好的咖啡。感谢您与我们一起努力，走在咖啡世界的前沿!

sections.title: 云南咖啡
sections.text:
云南咖啡的故事起源于 19 世纪末，法国传教士 Alfred Lietard 带来了他在 1982 年种植的植物。他最初这样做是为了给自己一个私人杯子。他在云南宾川市附近的山谷和村庄种植了第一批阿拉比卡咖啡豆。今天，几代人之后，有三十多个品种继续茁壮成长，可以追溯到这些早期的种子，这些种子是由 Lietard 播下的。

我们沿着蜿蜒的道路来到了阿尔弗雷德·利塔德种植的原始农场。有超过 100 年树龄的树木仍在生长。我们曾到云南的其他农场品尝过这些品种，我们很高兴与您分享我们在探险中发现的这种非常特别的咖啡！

6989174046773.en.title: Cafe Awake Toddler baseball shirt
6989174046773.en.description: Get your toddler a unique Cafe Awake baseball shirt that'll look nice and feel comfortable during their activities. Your little one will look as cool as ever with the shirts' raglan sleeves and shirttail hem. • 100% ring-spun combed cotton • Fabric weight: 4.5 oz/yd² (153 g/m²) • Heather colors are 60% ring-spun combed cotton and 40% polyester • Soft jersey fabric • Ribbed collar • Raglan sleeves • Shirttail hem • Flatlock stitched collar and armholes • Double-needle stitched sleeves and bottom hem • Blank product sourced from India or Haiti
6989174046773.en.descriptionHtml:
Get your toddler a unique Cafe Awake baseball shirt that'll look nice and feel comfortable during their activities. Your little one will look as cool as ever with the shirts' raglan sleeves and shirttail hem.

• 100% ring-spun combed cotton
• Fabric weight: 4.5 oz/yd² (153 g/m²)
• Heather colors are 60% ring-spun combed cotton and 40% polyester
• Soft jersey fabric
• Ribbed collar
• Raglan sleeves
• Shirttail hem
• Flatlock stitched collar and armholes
• Double-needle stitched sleeves and bottom hem
• Blank product sourced from India or Haiti
